The all-new Amazon Kindle (2024) is now available for purchase. It comes with several noticeable improvements. The biggest changes include a higher contrast ratio, faster page turns, and a 25% brighter front light at the maximum setting.

The battery life has also been improved. Amazon says it can last for up to six weeks. This includes  30 minutes of reading per day with wireless off and the light setting at 13. The actual battery life will surely vary based on your particular usage. While the device is shipped with a USB-C charging cable, there is no wall charger/adapter.

If you are looking for a new charger, we are here to help. Check out these best Amazon Kindle (2024) chargers you can grab.

  • Best Amazon Kindle (2024) cases

Amazon 9W Charger

It is the official Amazon charger for Kindle, Fire tablets, and Echo Dot. It is capable of charging devices at up to 9W charging speed. It will take about 2 hours to charge the new Kindle. It has a single microUSB port and does not come with a charging cable.

Amazon Basics 12W Charger

This is an affordable Amazon Basics wall charger with up to 12W charging speed. It has a single USB-A port but does not support Quick Charge. It is quite lightweight and compact, thanks to foldable prongs. Available in Black and White colors.

Samsung 15W USB-C Charger

This is a USB-C charger from Samsung where you get a single port. It will offer up to 15W charging speed and supports USB PD. It also comes bundled with a USB-C to USB-C cable. Available in Black and White colors.

Anker PowerPort III 20W Charger (2-pack)

This is a compact-sized wall charger with a peak charging speed of 20W. There are foldable prongs which makes it easier to carry around. There are various safety features to keep the temperature under check.

UGREEN 20W USB-C Charger

This wall charger comes with a single USB-C port. It can deliver up to 20W charging speed. It is compatible with PD 3.0, Quick Charge 4.0, PPS, and BC1.2 charging protocols. It is one the lightweight chargers you can get.

Anker Ace 25W USB-C Charger

This is a 25W charging speed wall charger from Anker. It has a single USB-C port with PPS tech support. It has foldable prongs and is about 23% smaller in size. Anker's PowerIQ 3.0 technology helps with optimized charging depending on the device.
